sys_script.name: Set Scratchpad Values

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_587759_loaner_re_loaner_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set Scratchpad Values</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

			g_scratchpad.city = current.requested_for.city;
			g_scratchpad.country = current.requested_for.country;
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-12 01:38:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3e1d0d922f3220107054811df699b627</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Scratchpad Values</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_587759_loaner_re">c39602dd2f3220107054811df699b661</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">c39602dd2f3220107054811df699b661</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3e1d0d922f3220107054811df699b627</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-12 01:38:59</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3e1d0d922f3220107054811df699b627"/></record_update>
